containers.HomePage.securityDescription: Built-in authentication and authorization using JWT (refresh token concept). OTP module for 2FA.
containers.HomePage.developmentDescripti: Easy to customize and extend each component, saving you time and money.
containers.HomePage.moduleDescription: Role based access controls, user management, Dashboard, Email modules, Security modules and more.
containers.HomePage.customizeDescription: Since this cms is build using popular frameworks like NestJS & ReactJS, you can easily customize it to your needs.
containers.HomePage.deploymentDescriptio: This CMS can be easily deployed and used all details are in the documentation.
